ComicInfo.Summary:
Tokyo Tower is under siege as Yokai and young gods clash. JIM ZUB (SKULLKICKERS, SAMURAI JACK) and STEVE CUMMINGS (DEADSHOT) continue their acclaimed supernatural spectacle.
